column3: na odzi boka aahow ekyir: dabaa ɔma atorsɛm na amamfoyɛ dɔɔ so; na wɔnye Asiria dzi ahyɛmu
na ɔbɛtsea Jakob dɛ mbrɛ n'akwan tse; mbrɛ ne ndzeyɛɛ tse ara na ɔbɛhyɛ no ananmu."

column2: "Yafun mu na osuoo no nua anantsir: na n'ahoɔdzen mu

column3: onyaa ahoɔdzen boor ɔbɔfo no dze do; na odzii nyim: osui
column4: na ɔkotowee serɛɛ no: ohun no wɔ Bɛtɛl
column5: na hɔ na ɔnye hɛn kasae;"

column3: dɔm Nyankopɔn no a; ne nkaa dzin dze EWURADZE."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi san bra wo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn: suo mbɔbɔrhu na atsɛmbu mu
"Ɔbatanyi no kitsa nsisi nsɛn wɔ ne nsamu: na ɔpɛ emimdzi."

column4: menya adze: m'edwuma nyina mu worunnhu mo mu emumuyɛ biara a ɔyɛ bɔn."

column2: "Naaso emi nye EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze fitsi Egypt asaase do; mebɛma ada ho ara atsena asese mu bio
column3: dɛ afahyɛ krɔnkrɔn nda no mu."
na mama enyido adzehu adɔɔ so; na menam nkɔnhyɛfo som do mebubu mbɛ."

column2: "Ana Gilead yɛ emumuyɛdze a? Wɔadan egyangyandze koraa; Gilgal mu na wɔdze anantwi bɔ okum afɔr: nhwɛ
column3: hɔn afɔrmbukyia tse dɛ kwa mu akɔfi mu esiwesiw."

column2: "Na Jakob guanee kɔr Aram haban mu
column3: na Israel somee wɔ yer ntsi

column2: "Na EWURADZE nam nkɔnhyɛnyi do dze Israel fii Egypt bae
column3: na ɔnam nkɔnhyɛnyi do koraa no do."

column2: "Efraim eyi ebufuw yerɛyerɛɛyerɛw: dɛm ntsi wɔbɛma no bɔgyaa ebua n'etsifi
column3: na n'EWURADZE adan n'ahorohoraa egu no do."
